fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.misc

Class ModelException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.misc.ModelException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ModelException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Class that handle errors generated by the model.

    This class is used to handle errors that could happen during model access. More than one code can be saved in an instance of the class. Error codes can be converted to localised messages via dedicated methods.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
